verses.roman:
śrī-śuka uvāca
evaṁ bhagavatā rājan
vasudeva udāhṛtaḥ
śrutvā vinaṣṭa-nānā-dhīs
tūṣṇīṁ prīta-manā abhūt

synonyms: śrī-śukaḥ uvāca—Śukadeva Gosvāmī said; evam—thus; bhagavatā—by the Supreme Lord; rājan—O King (Parīkṣit); vasudevaḥ—Vasudeva; udāhṛtaḥ—spoken to; śrutvā—hearing; vinaṣṭa—destroyed; nānā—dualistic; dhīḥ—his mentality; tūṣṇīm—silent; prīta—satisfied; manāḥ—in his heart; abhūt—he was.
translation: Śukadeva Gosvāmī said: O King, hearing these instructions spoken to him by the Supreme Lord, Vasudeva became freed from all ideas of duality. Satisfied at heart, he remained silent.
